82324269.title: Vajusha
82324269.extract: Vajusha (lit. 'Widow's Peak') is a prominent summit in the Accursed Mountains range, located on the border between northern Albania and Montenegro. It reaches a height of 2,210 m (7,250 ft) above sea level,  rising above the upper Grebaje Valley on the Montenegrin side and the Lepushë village on the Albanian one.
